about_the_game:
32 Original songs composed by Viktor Sehr - one of the three brothers that created Grand Mountain Adventure - except for Song Of A Winter Morning, which is a collaboration between Viktor and Sebastian Sehr.

As per request of a large number of player, we're releasing this OST for free!

We hope you'll enjoy it 😉
detailed_description:
32 Original songs composed by Viktor Sehr - one of the three brothers that created Grand Mountain Adventure - except for Song Of A Winter Morning, which is a collaboration between Viktor and Sebastian Sehr.

As per request of a large number of player, we're releasing this OST for free!

We hope you'll enjoy it 😉
name: Grand Mountain Adventure - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 55 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 525 MB available space
